description: network interfaces monitor for KDE's systray
details:
KNemo displays for every network interface an icon in the systray.
 Tooltips and an info dialog provide further information about the
 interface.  Passive popups inform about interface changes.
 A traffic plotter is also integrated.

 knemo polls the network interface status every second.
 interface::x11, role::program, scope::utility, suite::kde,
 uitoolkit::qt, use::monitor, works-with::network-traffic, x11::applet
